headline: Iron Mountain stock plunges after Gotham City short report
summary: Investing.com -- Iron Mountain (NYSE:IRM) stock plunged 6% Wednesday after short-seller Gotham City Research released a scathing report questioning the company’s accounting practices and financial health.
